parameters.name: refmet
parameters.text: the sgt vector embedding result of the reference metabolites, which is parsed via the ``molecular_vector`` and ``embedding_vec`` function.

molecular_tree.title: Make metabolite clustering via UMAP algorithm

parameters.name: refmet
parameters.text: a dataframe object of the reference metabolite, should contains the ``refmet_name`` of the metabolite as identifier and the ``smiles`` structure data for do molecular vector embedding.

molecular_vector.returns: a hds package that contains tuple list of the atom link vector data of each reference metabolite which have the smiles structure data.
molecular_vector.title: Parse the structure of molecular and then convert to atom link vector

embedding_vec.returns: a dataframe data that contains the sgt embedding result. each row names is the identifier of the metabolite, example as the metabolite name or metabolite reference id, the row values is the sgt embedding vector.
embedding_vec.title: make sgt embedding of the molecule strcutre data
